Package address

Class DataBaseConnect

java.lang.Object
address.DataBaseConnect
public class DataBaseConnect extends Object
Author:
Arshdeep Padda DataBaseConnect facilitates connection to Oracle DB and provides CRUD for AddressBookEntry table.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataBaseConnect

      public DataBaseConnect() throws ClassNotFoundException
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if DB Driver not present.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect() throws SQLException, IOException, RuntimeException
      Establish connection to DB.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the database has errors
      IOException - If file not found or inaccessible.
      RuntimeException - CredFileInvalidFormat if format invalid.
      RuntimeException - Message: "CredFileInvalidFormat" if format invalid.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect() throws SQLException
      Disconnect connection to DB.
      Throws:
      SQLException - when it has database errors

    • load_cred

      public String load_cred() throws IOException
      Load username and password credentials from file. Attempts to load "./db_cred.txt" from cwd. Expected format of file: first line should be: [username]/[password]
      Returns:
      String representation of username / password read, as [username]/[password].
      Throws:
      IOException - If file inaccessible.
      RuntimeException - Message: "CredFileInvalidFormat" if format invalid.

    • read

      public AddressEntry[] read() throws SQLException
      Read all entries in AddressBookEntry table.
      Returns:
      Array of AddressEntry.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Exception

    • read

      public AddressEntry read(long id) throws SQLException
      Read AddressEntry from DB using ID.
      Parameters:
      id - AE ID in table.
      Returns:
      AddressEntry read, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Exception.

    • create

      public int create(AddressEntry ae) throws SQLException
      Add AddressEntry to AddressBookEntry table.
      Parameters:
      ae - AE to add.
      Returns:
      Integer representing number of rows affected.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Exception

    • delete

      public int delete(long id) throws SQLException
      Delete AddressEntry in Database by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of AE to delete. Type long.
      Returns:
      Integer of how many rows were deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Exception

    • update

      public int update(AddressEntry ae, long id) throws SQLException
      Update AddressEntry in table identified by ID using new AE fields. All fields of $ae are used to update the row in the db table identified by ID.
      Parameters:
      ae - AE to use to update table.
      id - ID of AE in table to target.
      Returns:
      Integer representing number of rows affected.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQL Exception
